attributes.action: ABOLISH bedroom tax! STOP families being made homeless!!
attributes.additional_details:
I am starting this petition because I Myself and thousands of other people living in this country are finding it a struggle to live with this bedroom tax. Myself and many are being  forced to pay it because there are no smaller properties to downsize to and families are getting made homeless or in serious debt because of this shamble of a new tax! This has to go its not fair! Lets stop this together.
Thank you,
